sentences.en: A shower of thoroughBred horses; a shower of great affection.
sentences.cn: 纯种马的展出者; 显示出极大爱慕之情的人.

sentences.en: All the Performance of a Thoroughbred Sports Car.
Breeders of thoroughbred animals perpetuate genetic disorders to keep pedigrees pure.
sentences.cn: 纯种家畜的养育者们为了保持纯正的动物血统无休止地制造遗传上的混乱现象.

sentences.en: Denisov, in a long cape and a high fur cap, both streaming with water, was riding a thin, pinched - looking, thoroughbred horse.
sentences.cn: 杰尼索夫骑在一匹精瘦两肋下陷的良种马上，雨水从他戴的羊皮帽和披的毡斗篷上流淌下来。

sentences.en: He's a thoroughbred boxer with an outstanding pedigree.
sentences.cn: 它是只纯种拳师狗,有优秀血统.

sentences.en: Horse Racing and Thoroughbred Sales go hand in hand at Magic Millions.
sentences.cn: 赛马及良种销售齐头并进,在魔术数百万人.

sentences.en: Josie: That's not surprising because it's not a thoroughbred, it's a mongrel.
sentences.cn: 卓喜: 那不奇怪啊,因为它不是纯种狗, 是混种的.

sentences.en: Mr Dolphus Raymond lurched by on his thoroughbred.
sentences.cn: 多尔佛斯·雷蒙德先生骑着他的纯种马晃晃悠悠地过去了.

sentences.en: Perhaps I ain't a thoroughbred, but I at for become a thoroughbred but effort!
sentences.cn: 也许我不是千里马, 但我却在为成为一匹千里马而努力!

sentences.en: She was riding a thoroughbred horse.
The dog is a real thoroughbred.
sentences.cn: 这条狗是真正的纯种狗.

sentences.en: Therefore discipline yourself as a horse - dealer trains a thoroughbred.
sentences.cn: 好好地锻炼自己,就像马贩调教纯种好马一样.

sentences.en: This daughter of the shadows was thoroughbred.
sentences.cn: 这位出自幽谷的姑娘有根基.

sentences.en: This thoroughbred roadster has strong roots in racing, especially in the Mille Miglia.
sentences.cn: 这纯种跑车具有很强的根植于赛车, 尤其是在里程奖励.

sentences.en: Thoroughbred horses are highly - strung animals and do not like loud noises or sudden movements.
sentences.cn: 良种赛马是十分敏感的动物,它们不喜欢吵闹声或突然的运动.

sentences.en: Usain Bolt roared out of the blocks, accelerating like a thoroughbred.
sentences.cn: 乌塞恩·博尔特吼着冲出起跑线, 加速飞跑就像一匹骏马.

words.tran_cn: 良种的；受过严格训练的；优秀的

trans.tran_cn: (指牲畜)纯种的、良种的, (指人)高尚的、受过良好教养的
纯种的动物（尤指马），受过严格训练的人，有教养的人
